documentation.text:
Confirm the purchase as buyer.
 The ether will be locked until confirmReceived
 is called.

Confirm that the smart contract's owner received the item.
 This will release the locked ether.

Refound owner if he decided to cancel the order before
 the Closed state (before unlock)

documentation.text:
Confirm the purchase as buyer.
 The ether will be locked until confirmReceived
 is called.

Confirm that the smart contract's owner received the item.
 This will release the locked ether.

Refound owner if he decided to cancel the order before
 the Closed state (before unlock)

InvalidState().notice: The function cannot be called at the current state.

OnlyOwner().notice: only the owner of the contract can call this function

OnlySeller().notice: only the seller can call this function

confirmReceived(uint256,uint256).notice: Confirm that the smart contract's owner received the item. This will release the locked ether.

newOrder(address,uint256).notice: Confirm the purchase as buyer. The ether will be locked until confirmReceived is called.

refundOwner(uint256).notice: Refound owner if he decided to cancel the order before the Closed state (before unlock)
